item.title: Scania r 440 + carreta 4 patas v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 2, 2026

Scania r 440 + carreta 4 patas v1.0 ETS2

Fix bugs
– Add some accessories
– Fix sound and more

Credits: Jeanzao

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Skins Pack v1.6 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 2, 2026

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Skins Pack v1.6 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Truck Skins Pack

The Kenworth Skins pack is built by The Godfather’s Mods Company and covers over Modded Kenworth Trucks in American Truck Simulator for the T909 / T908 RTA / T609 RTA / T610GTM / T680 SCS Software Truck & T680 Next Gen SCS Software Truck

v1.0 (Release Edition)
The Launch edition has a bunch of skins over a wide range of T Series Kenworth Trucks

v1.1 Update (May 2025)
This Update Adds the 1st wave of Kenworth T408SAR & T409SAR Skins Plus the Return of some T908 RTA Skins & new skins for the T909 / T609 & T610GTM Trucks also updated to the pack to work with the 1.54 ATS Update also the T680 Next Gen skins have been removed due to me losing the XML File for the T680 Next Gen truck also all T609RTA Skins have been removed due to mod studio 2 update screwing the way they do skinning.

v1.2 Update (July 2025)
This Update Brings 24 New Skins to the pack and also is updated for ATS v1.55

v1.3 Update (September 3rd 2025)
This Update brings a whole new wave of Skins to the pack with also our 1st wave of Kenworth T610SAR Skins & Kenworth T659 Skins to the pack so we have in this update 7 new T909 Skins , 4 new T908 RTA Skins , 1 new T610GTM Skin , 3 T659 Skins & 5 T610SAR Skins with a grand total of 20 brand new skins to the pack to bring the pack up to a grand total of 242 Kenworth Skins in the pack.

v1.4 Update (October 9th 2025)
This Update Brings 12 New Skins to the Pack with 4 new Kenworth T909 Skins , 5 New Kenworth T610 SAR Skins & 3 New Kenworth T900 Legend Frank Peru Skins and all skins are of real life Company’s and Brands for u all to enjoy and high in detail like always.

v1.5 Update (November 17th 2025)
This Update Brings 13 new skins to the pack with 5 new skins for the Kenworth T909 , 5 New skins for the Kenworth T610 SAR & 3 New skins for the Kenworth T659 This brings the pack up to a total of 255 skins also this update will make the pack work with ATS 1.57

V1.6 Update (February 2nd 2026)
This Update brings a total of 32 brand new skins to the pack with 22 new skins for the T909 , 11 new Skins for the T610SAR , 3 new skins for the T659 and 1 new skin for each the T408 , 409SAR & T608 this brings the pack up to a total of 294 Skins and will work on ATS Version 1.58 & ATS 1.57

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Iveco Fiat 180 1.58.x ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 2, 2026

Iveco Fiat 180 1.58.x ETS2

A quick word about the 180. It is a modernization of the 691 N1 and was built while awaiting changes to the Highway Code. It stands out for its robustness and versatility. Although it didn’t remain in production for long, it was quite successful, and some are still actively used today. It retains many of its predecessor’s features, but improvements have been made and it was equipped with a more powerful engine. As an interesting aside, several of them can be seen in the Torresi yard in a late 1970s film called Un polizia scomodo. Some scenes were filmed there, and these trucks can be seen paired with trailers built by Zorzi.

To install the mod, copy the files to the mod folder and activate them in your profile. You’ll find the new truck in the modders’ truck dealers section, and the trailers in the trailer dealers section.

If you uninstall the mod first, it’s recommended to sell the trucks and trailers belonging to the mod.
Successfully tested on version 1.57
Author: Antonio 62, Baltazar

Credits: Antonio 62, Baltazar

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
